description_for_human: Get real-time bus monitoring information for a specific stop.
description_for_model: Use the MTAStopMonitoring plugin to automatically fetch real-time bus monitoring information for a specific stop when it's being generated by the ChatGPT assistant. The plugin will return bus monitoring data, including vehicle information, arrival times, and other relevant information. The monitoring data can be used to provide users with up-to-date and accurate bus arrival information for their desired stop.
